data_description.name: ecephys_699888_2023-11-09_17-05-16

related_data.relation: Contains MRI and processing used to choose insertion locations.

data_description.data_summary: This dataset was collected to evaluate the accuracy and feasibility of the AIND MRI-guided insertion pipeline. One probe targets the retinotopic center of LGN, with drifting grating for receptive field mapping to evaluate targeting. Other targets can be evaluated in histology.

camera.notes: Did not record arc or module angles, did not calibrate

ephys_modules.notes: Off target by ~400 microns. Used Di-D
On target.Recorded at Z = 11823. Moved to final depth after recording, left at depth ~5min. Used Di-D

Off target by ~100 microns. Laser Protocol: "On" stimulus is this probe, 40 Hz stim (5 ramp on, 10 ms on, 5 ramp off, 5 off) @10mW (2.25 volts); New scale x: 8527y:5738 z:7175. "off" stimulus is same params, but aimed at frontal cortex near hole 16/14, New Scale = x:9755 y:1685 z:7174. On and off blocks are marked in recording using events. Doing 2 off-on blocks. Took a while to start experiment b.c. laser wouldn't reach, needed to reconfigure/correct colomator modual (works great now.). Note that 2nd block has late "stim on target" tag. Used Di-D
